Black Screen Problem work-around
================================

1. Download the NO INTRO FIX from http://www.gamecopyworld.com/games/pc_insanely_twisted_shadow_planet.shtml (this step may not be necessary)

2. After replacing the files: Right click the "Insanely Twisted Shadow Planet" icon

3. Select "Run with graphics processor" --> "Integrated graphics"

4. Play the game until you end up outside where you see the sky and a meteor falling from the sky (it'll only take a few seconds)

5. At this point the game should autosave 

6. Exit the game

7. Start the game using the High performance NVIDIA processor

8. When the game starts, select "Resume" & you should begin from where you left off.

================================
The black screen may occur after cutscenes. If that happens, alt+f4 the game and follow steps: 3, play game until autosave, 7, 8.

Maybe there's another way, hopefully there will be a fix, but for now this works for me.
